root.message: The COLL_METHOD field for indicator 17-5-1, translated into en
root.data:
Preliminary data are collected through the following means:

● An in-depth online questionnaire circulated to SDG focal points in statistical offices worldwide;

● Internet research carried out by UNCTAD;

● UNCTAD database on international investment agreements (IIA Navigator).

The official counterparts at the country level are national ministries and outward investment promotion agencies. The agency in charge may vary across countries depending on the national structure.
